title: U.S. mining industry total employment 1998 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of employees in thousands. In total the number of data points it has is 21.
Overall Number of employees in thousands has increased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Number of employees in thousands, about 842.0 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Number of employees in thousands, of value 502.0 was reported at Year 2003
